ComicInfo.Title: Apocalypse Endor; The Emperor's Court; Urchins; Tides of Terror; The Lesson; Smuggler's Blues; Mythology
ComicInfo.Summary:
A retired stormtrooper tells his version of the Battle of Endor.
Aayla Secura and Kit Fisto must find out who engineered a nano-virus that only affects the clone troopers.
Qui-Gon tells a young Obi-Wan a fable about why Jedis must not love.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-31 21:33:50. [CVDB97457] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:41:15. [Issue ID 214999]
